title: Coronavirus Set to Hurt Ad Sales: What's Next for Facebook (FB) Stock?
text: How much will Facebook, which makes practically all of its money from advertisements, suffer as more businesses temporarily close and or pull back on ad spending?

title: Facebook must face renewed privacy lawsuit over user tracking
text: A federal appeals court on Thursday revived nationwide litigation accusing Facebook Inc  of violating users' privacy rights by tracking their internet activity even after they logged out of the social media website.

title: Facebook to supply free Portals to some care home residents under NHS scheme
text: The UK government is pulling in tech firms to connect isolated residents and patients in care with family and friends via video call devices and services during the COVID-19 crisis.

title: Facebook supplies UK's NHS with 2,000 Portal devices to connect isolated patients
text: The video-calling devices will be distributed throughout hospitals and care homes.

title: Social Media Companies Face Ad Spending Reckoning Amid Coronavirus
text: Facebook, Twitter, Google, and the rest of the social media giants are taking a huge hit as ad sales fall off a cliff amid the COVID-19 pandemic.
